effects.effect: Inflicts regular damage.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.  User charges for one turn before attacking.
effects.shortEffect: Requires a turn to charge before attacking.  Has a $effect_chance% chance to paralyze the target.

moveDescription:
On the second turn, the user hits the target with
electrically charged ice. This may also leave the
target with paralysis.
